sn42.3:1.1: Atha kho yodhajivo gamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho yodhajivo gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.3:1.2: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam yodhajivanam bhasamananam:
sn42.3:1.3: ‘yo so yodhajivo sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.3:1.5: “Alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi”ti.
sn42.3:1.7: tatiyampi kho yodhajivo gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.3:1.8: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam yodhajivanam bhasamananam:
sn42.3:1.9: ‘yo so yodhajivo sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.3:2.2: ‘alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi’ti.
sn42.3:2.4: Yo so, gamani, yodhajivo sangame ussahati vayamati, tassa tam cittam pubbe gahitam dukkatam duppanihitam:
sn42.3:2.5: ‘ime satta hannantu va bajjhantu va ucchijjantu va vinassantu va ma va ahesum iti va’ti.
sn42.3:2.6: Tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti;
sn42.3:2.7: so kayassa bheda param marana parajito nama nirayo tattha upapajjatiti.
sn42.3:2.8: Sace kho panassa evam ditthi hoti:
sn42.3:2.9: ‘yo so yodhajivo sangame ussahati vayamati tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti, sassa hoti micchaditthi.
sn42.3:2.10: Micchaditthikassa kho panaham, gamani, purisapuggalassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
sn42.3:3.1: Evam vutte, yodhajivo gamani parodi, assuni pavattesi.
sn42.3:3.3: ‘alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi’”ti.
sn42.3:3.4: “Naham, bhante, etam rodami yam mam bhagava evamaha;
sn42.3:3.5: api caham, bhante, pubbakehi acariyapacariyehi yodhajivehi digharattam nikato vancito paluddho:
sn42.3:3.6: ‘yo so yodhajivo sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’”ti.
